ldapfields.user_id: field in your organization's LDAP which holds user ID
ldapfields.user_fullname: field in your organization's LDAP which holds user's given name
ldapfields.user_position: field in your organization's LDAP which holds user's position in the organization
ldapfields.user_title: field in your organization's LDAP which holds user's job title

courseList.course: course code or title, for example "APC101", "LIT705"
